answers.answer: It could be a few things. The first thing that popped in my head was maybe high blood pressure? That causes major dizziness and stress just makes it worse (of course lol). It could be extremely high and be preeclampsia, I've never had that so I'm not too sure about how that goes. Low blood sugar is another guess? And of course dehydration fits too. Maybe try to work on all of these and if it didn't help then I'd be stressing it to your Dr. I hope you feel better! That's scary!
Thank you so much I thought it was dehydration and stress bc I have been very very stressed lately like over stressed actually..
Awww I'm sorry girl. Stress is stressful lol. Everything seems to work out for the best though. I've learned to just go with the flow, eventually things even out. =)

First I would try drinking water. Could be dehydration but also could be preeclampsima. Do you have your next drs appt soon? I know those are all signs of it so I would for sure mention it to your dr. Hope its something simple! Good luck!!!
I hope everything work out with me being stressed too.. I just haven't felt normal at all lately..
I go in sometime this week for the glucose test..
the shaking and stuff happens at night time, like now it just feels like im weak and everything..

question: hi, Im 28 almost 29 weeks pregnant and for the past week I have been really dizzy, shaky like on the inside, out of breath, my throat has been dry and sometimes it feels like there's something stuck in my throat like spit and I can never get it out last night I was laying in my bed and I was really dizzy I felt like I was gonna pass out, I was shaky and I couldn't catch my breath ive also had a headache for weeks now.. idk if its dehydration or what but its really scaring me. like as soon as I wake up im shaky and out of breath just by waking up that's all.. I really wanna know what's wrong I don't wanna die or something.. OH ANOTHER THING I've been way too STRESSED out lately like a lot.. but no one will leave me alone and its hard for me to walk away from it when I can barely walk due to pain in my vag.. if anyone can help me out with this id really appreciate it(:
title: whats wrong with me
